<rule xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset" id="javaee-to-jakarta-namespaces-00051">
            <when>
                <xmlfile as="xml-file" matches="p:facelet-taglib[@version='2.3']">
                    <namespace prefix="p" uri="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee"/>
                </xmlfile>
                <filecontent as="result" from="xml-file" pattern="version={quotes}2.3{quotes}"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <iteration over="result">
                    <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the Java EE version with the Jakarta equivalent">
                        <message>`web-facelettaglibrary_2_3`: In the root tag, replace the `version` attribute value with `3.0`</message>
                        <link href="https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee/#9" title="Jakarta XML Schemas"/>
                        <quickfix name="javaee-namespaces-replace-web-facelettaglibrary_2_3-version" type="REPLACE">
                            <replacement>3.0</replacement>
                            <search>2.3</search>
                        </quickfix>
                    </hint>
                </iteration>
            </perform>
            <where param="quotes">
                <matches pattern="("|')"/>
            </where>
        </rule>
